allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Capacitor Android project for APK generation

- Set up Capacitor 6.x with Android platform
- Add package.json with build scripts
- Create capacitor.config.ts configuration
- Include Android project structure ready for APK build
- Add CLAUDE.md for AI assistant context
- Update .gitignore for Android build artifacts

To build APK: Install Java JDK 17 and Android SDK, then run:
  npm install && npx cap sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(if not exist www mkdir www)

Bash(powershell -Command "$paths = @\(''C:\\Android\\Sdk'', ''C:\\Program Files\\Android\\sdk'', ''C:\\Program Files \(x86\)\\Android\\sdk'', ""$env:LOCALAPPDATA\\Android\\Sdk""\); foreach \($p in $paths\) { if \(Test-Path $p\) { Write-Host ""Found: $p"" } }")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\\'' -Directory -Filter ''Android*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object FullName; Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files'' -Directory -Filter ''Android*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object FullName")

Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content telegram-cleaner-modern.html -Raw\) -match ''<script type=""text/babel"">'' -and \(Get-Content telegram-cleaner-modern.html -Raw\) -match ''</script>'' -and \(Get-Content telegram-cleaner-modern.html -Raw\) -match ''TelegramClient'' -and \(Get-Content telegram-cleaner-modern.html -Raw\) -match ''LoginScreen''")

Bash(powershell -Command "try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri ''http://localhost:8000/telegram-cleaner-modern.html'' -UseBasicParsing; Write-Host ''Status:'' $response.StatusCode; Write-Host ''Length:'' $response.Content.Length } catch { Write-Host ''Error:'' $_Exception.Message }")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add chat selection, fix double-count bug, and overhaul deletion logic

- Add "Select All Messages in Chat" checkbox for batch selection
- Fix double-count bug by enforcing exclusive selection between chats and individual messages
- Refactor deletion to handle individual messages and whole chats separately
- Add recursive deletion loop for clearing entire chat histories
- Add batch scanning API for counting user messages per chat
- Fix search/filter sync issues with Select All checkbox
- Add Node.js backend server for real Telegram API integration
- Update UI with improved glassmorphism design and progress tracking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
